languages.text: "И что ты сделаешь? Заставишь меня убить его? Отпустить? А если я откажусь, будешь биться со мной? Ради этого... как ты сказал{mf||а}... подонка? Интересно будет посмотреть".

traits.locale_text: "И что ты сделаешь? Заставишь меня убить его? Отпустить? А если я откажусь, будешь биться со мной? Ради этого... как ты сказал{mf||а}... подонка? Интересно будет посмотреть".
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."
languages.original_text: "И что ты сделаешь? Заставишь меня убить его? Отпустить? А если я откажусь, будешь биться со мной? Ради этого... как ты сказал{mf||а}... подонка? Интересно будет посмотреть".

traits.locale_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “你受够了？那你打算怎么样？强迫我杀了他？放他自由？如果我不肯，你打算和我打一架吗？就为了这个……你刚才是怎么叫他的来着？就为了这个人渣吗？我倒是挺想见识见识的。”
languages.original_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."

traits.locale_text: “你受够了？那你打算怎么样？强迫我杀了他？放他自由？如果我不肯，你打算和我打一架吗？就为了这个……你刚才是怎么叫他的来着？就为了这个人渣吗？我倒是挺想见识见识的。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «¿Y qué vas a hacer? ¿Obligarme a matarlo? ¿A dejarlo ir? Y si me niego, ¿vas a luchar contra mí? Por el bien de este... ¿cómo lo habías llamado? Un réprobo? Esto tengo que verlo».
languages.original_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué vas a hacer? ¿Obligarme a matarlo? ¿A dejarlo ir? Y si me niego, ¿vas a luchar contra mí? Por el bien de este... ¿cómo lo habías llamado? Un réprobo? Esto tengo que verlo».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「ならばどうするつもりだ？私に無理やり殺させるのか？それとも、解放しろと言うのか？私が拒否したら、貴様は私と戦うつもりか？この恥知らずで卑劣な者のために？それは見ものだ」
languages.original_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."

traits.locale_text: 「ならばどうするつもりだ？私に無理やり殺させるのか？それとも、解放しろと言うのか？私が拒否したら、貴様は私と戦うつもりか？この恥知らずで卑劣な者のために？それは見ものだ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Und was wollt Ihr tun? Mich zwingen, ihn zu töten? Ihn gehen zu lassen? Und wenn ich mich weigere, kämpft Ihr gegen mich? Nur für diesen ... wie habt Ihr ihn doch gleich genannt? Für diesen Schurken? Das würde ich gerne sehen."
languages.original_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."

traits.locale_text: "Und was wollt Ihr tun? Mich zwingen, ihn zu töten? Ihn gehen zu lassen? Und wenn ich mich weigere, kämpft Ihr gegen mich? Nur für diesen ... wie habt Ihr ihn doch gleich genannt? Für diesen Schurken? Das würde ich gerne sehen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Et que comptez-vous faire ? M'obliger à le tuer ? Le libérer ? Et si je refuse, vous allez me combattre ? Tout ça pour ce... Comment avez-vous dit, déjà ? Ce "dépravé" ? J'aimerais bien voir ça. »
languages.original_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."

traits.locale_text: « Et que comptez-vous faire ? M'obliger à le tuer ? Le libérer ? Et si je refuse, vous allez me combattre ? Tout ça pour ce... Comment avez-vous dit, déjà ? Ce "dépravé" ? J'aimerais bien voir ça. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ne yapacaksın? Zorla öldürtecek misin? Salıvermemi mi istiyorsun? Reddedersem dövüşecek miyiz? Bu... Ne demiştin, kaltaban mı? Bu kaltabanın hatırı için elinden geleni ardına koyma."
languages.original_text: "And what are you going to do? Force me to kill him? Let him go? And if I refuse, are you going to fight me? For the sake of this — what did you call him? Reprobate? I'd like to see that."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yapacaksın ki? Zorla öldürtecek misin? Salıvermemi mi istiyorsun? Reddedersem dövüşecek miyiz? Bu... Ne demiştin, kaltaban mı? Bunun hatırı için bir denemeni isterim."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
